title: Alexey Vermeulen Has to Miss Unbound Gravel. His Backup Plan? Qualifying for the Olympics.
content:
The gravel pro is racing the US Pro Nationals time trial this week. If he places well, he'll be Paris-bound.

Read the full article at Alexey Vermeulen Has to Miss Unbound Gravel. His Backup Plan? Qualifying for the Olympics. on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
